settlenewarticle-intro-text: You're about to create a new article, before you start please provide a bit more infromation about content you want to contribute - there is a big chance that we already have something similar in our database, so it may be a better choose to improve existing article instead of creating a new one. To proceed please fill fields below - select most relevant category for your article and provide some information about its effective location.
settlenewarticle-intro-text-step-1: Please enter title for your page:
settlenewarticle-message-api-nothing-fou: It seems that we don't have similar articles yet, you're free to proceed!
settlenewarticle-message-api-exact-match: We've found existing page that exactly matches yours. Please consider to contribute and improve already existing pages instead of creating similar copies.
settlenewarticle-message-api-fuzzy-match: There are page similar to what you're going to create exists, if someone already created page relative to your topic it may be a good idea to contribute instead of creating a new one:
